레벨 보정:—

마그민 are small, human-shaped beings from the 불 정령 세계 that radiate intense heat and are wreathed in an aura of searing flames. A typical 마그민 is 4 feet tall and weighs 400 pounds.

마그민 말하기 Ignan.

전투

COMBAT

Although small, 마그민 are dangerous opponents. Their touch is effective against those who lack protection or immunity from heat and flames, but if faced with opponents who have immunity to fire, 마그민 rely on their slam 공격. In any case, 마그민 are not valiant 전사. They usually flee if injured, although often only far enough to set up a fiery ambush for their enemies.

A 마그민’s natural 무기 are treated as 마법 무기 for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Combustion (Ex): Anyone a 마그민 touches must succeed on a DC 12 Reflex save or take an extra 1d8 points of fire 피해 as clothes ignite or 갑옷 becomes searing hot. The 피해 continues for another 1d4+2 rounds after the 마그민’s last successful 공격. 마그민 can also ignite flammable materials with a touch. The save DC is 건강-based.

Fiery Aura (Ex): Anyone within 20 feet of a 마그민 must succeed on a DC 12 Fortitude save or take 1d6 points of heat 피해 per round from the intense heat. The save DC is 건강-based.

Melt 무기 (Ex): Any metal weapon that strikes a 마그민 must succeed on a DC 12 Fortitude save or melt away into slag. The save DC is 건강-based.

A 맨티코어 begins most 공격 with a volley of spikes, then closes. In the outdoors, it often uses its powerful wings to stay aloft during battle.

All targets must be within 30 feet of each other. The creature can launch only twenty-four spikes in any 24-hour period.

A 메두사 is indistinguishable from a normal human at distances 상급 than 30 feet (or closer, if its face is concealed). The creature often wears garments that enhance its body while hiding

its face behind a hood or 가리개.

A typical 메두사 is 5 to 6 feet tall and about the same weight as a human.

메두사 말하기 Common.

전투

COMBAT

A 메두사 tries to 변장 its true nature until the intended victim is within 거리 of its petrifying gaze, using subterfuge and bluffing games to convince the target that there is no danger. It uses normal 무기 to 공격 those who avert their eyes or survive its gaze, while its poisonous 뱀 strike at adjacent opponents.

Petrifying Gaze (Su): Turn to stone permanently, 30 feet, Fortitude DC 15 negates. The save DC is 매력-based.

독 (Ex): Injury, Fortitude DC 14, initial 피해 1d6 Str, secondary 피해 2d6 Str. The save DC is 건강-based.

메피트

MEPHIT

메피트 are minor creatures from the 정령 이세계.

All 메피트 appear as small, winged creatures with more or less humanoid features. While they are often described as impish, their 정령 origins are apparent at first glance.

전투

COMBAT

All 메피트 fight by biting and clawing or by using a 브레스 무기, the nature and effects of which vary from creature to creature.

A 메피트’s natural 무기 are treated as 마법 무기 for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

브레스 무기 (Su): A 메피트 can use its 브레스 무기 once every 1d4 rounds as a standard action. See the individual 묘사 for details.

Spell-Like 능력: All 메피트 have one or more spell-like 능력 (save DC 12 + spell 레벨). See the individual 묘사 for details.

Summon 메피트 (Sp): Once per day, a 메피트 can attempt to summon another 메피트 of the same variety, much as though casting a summon monster spell, but with only a 25% chance of success. Roll d%: On a failure, no creature answers the summons that day. A 메피트 that has just been summoned cannot use its own summon ability for 1 hour. This ability is the equivalent of a 2nd-레벨 spell.

빠른 치료 (Ex): 메피트 치료 2 points of 피해 each round, provided they are still alive and certain other 상태이상 are met. See the individual 묘사 for details.
